personalisedMessage: Hi John, I noticed your recent posts on AI implementation in marketing - your insights align perfectly with what we're building.
Sarah, your CPO playbook articles have been incredibly valuable. I think there's a strategic opportunity for our platforms to collaborate.
Michael, I saw your recent expansion into Asia-Pacific. Our platform helps companies like yours scale operations efficiently.
Emma, based on your LinkedIn activity, it looks like you're building something interesting in the AI space. Would love to connect.
